Today's commit

BCSD Laboratory?

Abbreviation of Beyond Computer Software Developer, We mainly develope project that you want with us.
BCSDLAB is an IT specialization club and supported by NAVER D2 CAMPUS PARTNER.

Sign up

Our Project Study

Game Study

Using Unreal Engine, We develope simple game.

Algorithm

Using Dovelet, We solve Algorithm problem.

H/W

Using Raspberry pie, We study embeded system.

Python/Web

For freshman and other majors, We study about web using Python.
